mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_nickname, me_password, me_gender, me_birth, me_phone, me_address, me_name, me_resident_num, me_email, me_jAddress) values(#{me_id}, #{me_nickname}, #{me_password}, #{me_gender}, #{me_birth}, #{me_phone}, #{me_address}, #{me_name}, #{me_resident_num}, #{me_email}, #{me_jAddress})
mapper.select: select * from member where me_session_id = #{me_session_id} and me_session_limit > now()
